prompts: Create a small, fox-like Pokemon with bright fur and large ears.
I want a fire-type creature that has a playful and curious nature.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that resembles a fennec fox and loves to explore.
Make a Pokemon design featuring vibrant orange and yellow colors with a fluffy tail.
Imagine a friendly starter Pokemon with a fiery personality and a love for adventure.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into forest habitats and has enchanting features.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a combination of fox-like traits and elemental fire abilities.
